TopicTitle: Display Vehicle Mass, Resource Pane In VAB/SPH

Articles.Content: Small thing, and I know there are mods that do this, but it would be helpful if I was able to see the vehicle mass inside the building interface, and maybe the resource pane as well. That is all.
I back that - ATM I need to calculate my payload mass manually, and I hate that.

Looks like 1001st "KER/VOID/MechJeb Lite/Younameit should be a part of the stock game" thread. I'm new to this forum so I should say yes, I think it should. But I'm sure the devs already know what we think about it, so...

I'm of the opinion that vessel *MASS* should by all means be available in the VAB. You could add up the mass of all individual parts; you can even look up your mass if you go to launch, switch to map, then click that info panel. I see no reason not to show it in the VAB right away.

Delta-V maps are a different kind of beast, though. I understand why the devs aren't too forthcoming with that kind of data. Much of the fun in the early KSP experience stems from the "let's see what happens" approach to rocket design. Though that wears off... as far as I know, pretty much every seasoned player uses some Delta-V tool or another, and for good reason.
